title: Tween Workshop: Photo Stories
description:
Photographer Robert Frank has spent years looking in overlooked corners of American life. He has said, "When people look at my pictures I want them to feel the way they do when they want to read a line of a poem twice." Visit the exhibition Robert Frank: Photos Books Films. Be inspired to step behind the camera. What new images will you uncover?

This event is designed for tweens ages 9–12, without an accompanying adult. Tween member tickets may only be purchased using an adult membership. A consent form will be sent upon ticket purchase. Please return the form to familyprograms@artic.edu prior to the workshop.

This program is currently at capacity. To be added to the waiting list, please email us at familyprograms@artic.edu with your name and the program that you’re interested in. Although it is not guaranteed, we will contact you upon availability.

For more information about family programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or e-mail familyprograms@artic.edu. For upcoming family programs, please visit the family programs calendar.
